t: Motorcraft parts warranty NOT honored if you buy through Amazon - Ford Truck Enthusiasts Forums
s: December 5, 2021 - No problem, swap one in from parts truck. Same thing a few months later. So I found another used one. Lasted maybe a year. Enough of this, buy a brand new one (figured the spring steel is all the same age on the original parts). Bought a genuine Ford motorcraft part from Amazon.
